data.text: @imgrund They end masks in schools. But the government doesn’t go into schools so they have no stake.

@MiazPat @Kristen60601 @RealAlanBrooks @imgrund What about the kindergarten who had recent surgery and has immediate family battling cancer? What about the grandparents raising their grandchildren?  They exist in many of our classrooms. What's your age cut off for disposable?

@Kindermom1 @Kristen60601 @RealAlanBrooks @imgrund Yes that’s terrible but people not wearing masks isn’t going to help him. He has to worry about everything not just Covid. Old people are at risk so they should take precautions but the rest of us don’t need to. The vaccine doesn’t stop the spread either

@MiazPat @Kristen60601 @RealAlanBrooks @imgrund My father in law also had a double lung transplant.  He waited 3 years to get new lungs, unable to live.  Now he has to stay home because no one cares to protect him.  Covid isn't gone.  The RT is increasing right now.  And a lot of you didn't get the vaccine or finish getting it

@MiazPat @Kristen60601 @RealAlanBrooks @imgrund I teach kindergarten.  Yes they deserve to feel safe.  All of them.  That's what Canadians do no?  We take care of society. Unless you are a PC I guess,  then you look out for yourself.
@RealAlanBrooks @Kristen60601 @imgrund Deal (and I do hope you won’t be brain damaged)
@Kindermom1 @Kristen60601 @RealAlanBrooks @imgrund Who already has enough on their plate. And congratulations on teaching kindergarten. I don’t know what that has to do with the price of beans.

@Kristen60601 @Kindermom1 @RealAlanBrooks @imgrund So you want everyone to wear a mask so that some people don’t get made fun of for wearing one?  Most people already had Covid or the vaccine or both so wearing a mask is pointless for them. Everyone who needs one or wants one can still wear them. Just don’t make everyone.
@lauraflevine @Kristen60601 @imgrund Let’s revisit in ten years, unless I’m brain damaged significantly, I’ll own my error in judgement

@RealAlanBrooks @Kristen60601 @imgrund The experts are not saying every single person will get Covid. If that were the case, you wouldn’t see experts still saying that masks are important. It’s clear that we are at an impasse and the mask requirements are being lifted. I wish you and your brain the best.
